item.description:
Hike the Mid State trail from Crow Hill in Leominster State Forest to Redemption Rock to the Wachusett Mt. Ski Area.
The trail follows the ridge line across Crow Hill ledges over to Redemption Rock where it winds it way through a forested trail that rounds Wachusett Lake over to the ski area. We will not be climbing the mountain.
Return will be on the same trails.
Around 6 miles round trip. 3.5-4.5 hours.

The parking area is in Westminster. This is the gated/paved parking area directly across from the trail head to the ledges. Coming from Rt. 2/Fitchburg area and traveling south on Rt. 31 the parking area will be on your left.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Crow Hill to Wachusett Mt.
